statements: SELECT * FROM adult_learners;
SELECT learner_id, first_name, last_name FROM adult_learners;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM adult_learners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT learner_id, first_name, last_name, preferred_learning_mode FROM adult_learners WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM adult_learners ORDER BY first_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT learner_id, first_name, last_name, education_level FROM adult_learners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM adult_learners WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT DISTINCT education_level FROM adult_learners;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners WHERE preferred_learning_mode = 'Online' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics;
SELECT learner_id, first_name, last_name FROM adult_learners_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT preferred_learning_style, preferred_learning_time FROM learning_preferences;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, education_level FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE education_level IN ('Bachelor','Master') ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics JOIN learning_preferences USING(learner_id) WHERE preferred_learning_style = 'Visual' AND preferred_subject = 'Math';
SELECT first_name, last_name, preferred_learning_style FROM adult_learners_demographics JOIN learning_preferences USING(learner_id) WHERE preferred_learning_time = 'Evening';
SELECT first_name, last_name, education_level, preferred_subject FROM adult_learners_demographics JOIN learning_preferences USING(learner_id) WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM adults_demographics;
SELECT gender, age FROM adults_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT occupation, education_level FROM adults_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT preferred_topic, preferred_modality FROM learning_preferences WHERE preferred_duration > 60;
SELECT satisfaction_rating, improvement_suggestions FROM program_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM adults_demographics;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM adults_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, education_level, occupation FROM adults_demographics WHERE occupation LIKE 'Engineer%';
SELECT learner_id, preferred_topic, preferred_duration FROM learning_preferences WHERE preferred_modality = 'Online' ORDER BY preferred_duration DESC;
SELECT learner_id, satisfaction_rating, improvement_suggestions FROM program_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics;
SELECT learner_id, age, gender FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT learner_id, education_level FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM learning_preferences ORDER BY preferred_learning_mode DESC;
SELECT learner_id, feedback_date FROM learner_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT learner_id, gender FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE education_level='Bachelor'
SELECT * FROM learning_preferences WHERE preferred_learning_mode='Online' AND preferred_subject='Math'
SELECT program_name, improvement_area FROM program_improvement ORDER BY improvement_id ASC
SELECT feedback_text FROM learner_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT learner_id, ethnicity FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT preferred_time, preferred_subject FROM learning_preferences
SELECT feedback_text FROM program_improvement WHERE program_id = 3
SELECT enrollment_status, enrollment_date FROM enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date
SELECT * FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY learner_id DESC;
SELECT learner_id, education_level FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE ethnicity='Hispanic' AND gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM learning_preferences WHERE preferred_time='Evening' AND preferred_subject='Mathematics' ORDER BY learner_id ASC;

SELECT assessments.assessment_id, assessments.assessment_score, adult_learners_demographics.gender FROM assessments JOIN adult_learners_demographics ON assessments.learner_id = adult_learners_demographics.learner_id WHERE assessment_score > 80;

SELECT enrollment.enrollment_date, program_improvement.feedback_text, adult_learners_demographics.age FROM enrollment JOIN program_improvement ON enrollment.program_id = program_improvement.program_id JOIN adult_learners_demographics ON enrollment.learner_id = adult_learners_demographics.learner_id WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
